text: Alessandro André Schöpf (; born 7 February 1994) is an Austrian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Major League Soccer club Vancouver Whitecaps FC and the Austria national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Bayern Munich II 2012–13 Regionalliga Bayern 29 11 — — — 29 11 2013–14 Regionalliga Bayern 34 11 — — 2Appearances in the Regionalliga promotion play- off. 0 36 11 Total 63 22 — — 2 0 65 22 Nürnberg 2014–15 2.
